characterDescription: Szeth's spren, with which he bonded before the Battle of Thaylen Field, continues to refuse to share its name. However, when Szeth swore his Third Ideal during that battle, his spren approved.

characterDetails.Appearance: Just as other highspren are, Szeth's spren is shaped as small slits in the air, separating the sky, like wounds in skin, exposing a black field full of stars. When it moves, the substance of reality bends around it.
characterDetails.Beliefs: Szeth's spren believes that Szeth will be able to reach the Fifth Ideal, and even instructs Szeth on how this will be achieved.
characterDetails.Character:
Szeth has felt a surge of approval from this spren who only rarely shows itself to him, even still.
As one might suspect of a highspren, Szeth's spren can be judgmental, especially when of Szeth's worth. It addresses him as acolyte.
characterDetails.Abilities: Szeth's spren is able to make itself invisible.
